ModMetaData.name: [SZ]蒙兀室韦-蒙兀族派系和相关扩展 Mughal faction and related expansions
ModMetaData.author: DiamondJ 鱼盐 Frolg
ModMetaData.description: Supported languages: Chinese, English (English translation still has a small part to be completed) 【作者】\n代码：Diamond.J\n主要贴图：鱼盐\n部分动物和宣传图：Frolg 【主要内容】\n\n主要做了蒙兀派系，特色商队，蒙兀叙述者，蒙兀服饰和盔甲，蒙兀武器，蒙兀太空武器，蒙兀族背景故事，蒙兀四个特色动物，蒙兀特色干粮，蒙兀特色家具，蒙兀特色文化和模因起源等等。 【更新日志】 你们的支持就是我更新的动力！ QQ群：786428265 二群：773179016 B站ID：Diamond_JDog（或者搜神州就有） Supported languages: Chinese, English (English translation still has a small part to be completed) [Author]\nCode: Diamond.J\nMain stickers: Fish Salt\nSome animals and publicity pictures: Frolg [Main content]\n\nMainly made Mughal factions, characteristic caravans, Mughal narrators, Mughal clothing and armor, Mughal weapons, Mughal space weapons, Mughal background The story, the four characteristic animals of Muwu, the characteristic dry food of Muwu, the characteristic furniture of Muwu, the characteristic culture of Muwu and the origin of memes, etc. [Update Log] Your support is the motivation for my update! QQ group: 786428265 Second group: 773179016 Station B ID: Diamond_JDog (or search Shenzhou)
